alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Holmes; Humphreys; Leflore; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 4:37PM CDT until June 08 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Holmes County in central Mississippi... Carroll County in north central Mississippi... Southeastern Leflore County in north central Mississippi... Northeastern Yazoo County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Humphreys County in central Mississippi... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 437 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Blaine to near Swiftown to near Midnight, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Tchula around 445 PM CDT. Greenwood and Thornton around 450 PM CDT. Black Hawk and Lexington around 455 PM CDT. Malmaison, Coxburg, Bowling Green, Emory and Tolarville around 500 PM CDT. Durant, North Carrollton, Ebenezer, Coila and Brozville around 505 PM CDT. Franklin around 510 PM CDT. Goodman, Pickens and Vaiden around 515 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Eden, Carrollton, West and Cruger. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
